synopsis.text: Mikine Nezu, a quiet classmate, and Ushikawa Ukiji, a laid-back upperclassman, join the eccentric duo of Yachiyo Inugami and Suzu Nekoyama as they navigate their unconventional relationship. Inugami, a cat enthusiast with a dog-like personality, and Nekoyama, a dog lover with cat-like traits, find themselves inexplicably drawn to one another. As they grow closer, their contrasting personalities create a whirlwind of comedic chaos, with their friend Hiiragi Aki attempting to keep the peace. Follow the wild and vibrant tale of these two high school girls and their less-than-normal romance in Inugami-san to Nekoyama-san.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
